title: Correct an Error on an Application
description: An agent made a typo in an applicant's date of birth on a life insurance application that is pending review.

tasks.expected_outcome: The agent finds the application in the system.

tasks.description: Identify the incorrect date of birth.
Submit a request to the underwriter to correct the demographic information.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent sends a formal request to the underwriting team to amend the application with the correct date of birth.
